Package com.tinmegali.security.mcipher.exceptions

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MCipherException
    com.tinmegali.security.mcipher.exceptions | MCipher __________________________________ Created by tinmegali 22/02/2018
    MDecryptorException
    An 'wrapper' Exception thrown by decryption operations, that wraps it up numerous Exception that can be thrown by the MDecryptorDefault.decryptData(byte[], Cipher) The Throwable.getMessage() holds an message, containing the original Exception, that you can fetch it with Throwable.getCause()
    MEncryptorException
    An 'wrapper' Exception thrown by encryption operations, that wraps it up numerous Exception that can be thrown by the MEncryptorDefault.encryptData(byte[], Cipher) method.
    MKeyWrapperException
    Exceptions to be trow by com.tinmegali.security.mcipher.KeyWrapper utility class.
